file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】A ZOMBIE IDOL'S DREAM COME TRUE？! #KureijiOllie3D [qk0HSjgN5LQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Kureiji Ollie performs a comedy skit in a ramen shop setting where she's confronted by a shadowy figure at gunpoint, but reveals she has a much larger weapon.
Kureiji Ollie performs her original song "NEW [zom]BIE!!" on a 3D stage with high-energy choreography.
